Articles.Content: What fixed version are you talking about? If you mean http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/44135-0-22-Universe-Replacer-v4-0?p=808041&viewfull=1#post808041, that's an early version of this plugin.

OK, download the new version and now none of my textures load up, they are pgns.

That last test DLL loaded my EVA suits but not my Skybox ones.

They appear to load, showing in ksp.log file, but they aren't show in game.

Edited December 8, 2013 by therealcrow999

I don't know if this makes a difference, I start my game up with KSP Launcher and not the KSP.exe.

OK, download the new version and now none of my textures load up, they are pgns.

That last test DLL loaded my EVA suits but not my Skybox ones.

They appear to load, showing in ksp.log file, but they aren't show in game.

@therealcrow999: You're using the new 0.5 version, right?

I can confirm that 0.5 loads textures OK and I'm seeing definite performance improvements on Linux x86_64. Not using the launcher, though...

Thanks again Shaw.

Skybox replacing for the last plugin version (0.5) doesn't work.

Textures loaded

[LOG 02:42:41.339] Load(Texture): TextureReplacer/Textures/GalaxyTex_NegativeX

[LOG 02:42:42.119] Load(Texture): TextureReplacer/Textures/GalaxyTex_NegativeY

[LOG 02:42:42.722] Load(Texture): TextureReplacer/Textures/GalaxyTex_NegativeZ

[LOG 02:42:43.375] Load(Texture): TextureReplacer/Textures/GalaxyTex_PositiveX

[LOG 02:42:44.058] Load(Texture): TextureReplacer/Textures/GalaxyTex_PositiveY

[LOG 02:42:44.674] Load(Texture): TextureReplacer/Textures/GalaxyTex_PositiveZ

but nothing changed.

But works fine with previous version.

Tried with the same textures.

Edited December 8, 2013 by MaxP

@MaxP, therealcrow999: Could you check if this DLL works: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/9508397/TextureReplacer-0.5a.dll.

I really don't know which change in the code could cause this. And what about other textures? Do Kerbal suits work?

v0.5, nothing showed up for me, not even the Kerbal suits. The only two I have are skybox and kerbal textures, so when game starts I could see if the textures work or not.

I even played through game and nothing. Yeah I couldn't understand it either. I will try this latest DLL and get back to you.

@MaxP, therealcrow999: Could you check if this DLL works: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/9508397/TextureReplacer-0.5a.dll.

I really don't know which change in the code could cause this. And what about other textures? Do Kerbal suits work?

Yeah v.05a is working. The skybox and kerbal textures loaded. I didn't have time to do proper test of Framerates, they seem really good. I will give proper test tomorrow.

Thanks for updates.

Wow wow wow man... You've done it. Where you've been hiding so long? ))

38-40 fps vs 40 w/o plugin - at least we have it.

That results is for 0.5a, I've tested on orbit.

0.6 shows only 16 fps with the same options - only skybox.

Edited December 9, 2013 by MaxP
Oops. It should be fixed in 0.6.1.

You're making new versions faster than my KSP loading

P.S. He-he, with the starless skybox it runs faster than stock

Not a big difference, just 50-51 fps versus 49, but 've noticed, and it is a fact ))

And it looks fantastic... Just feel it:

Thank you, shaw.

Edited December 9, 2013 by MaxP

Its running awesome, haven't played the game yet but test are good. You hit the nail on the head.

Thanks for tackling this mod. I really wanted to change my Kerbal suits and skybox, I was heart broken with UR.

Good job.

Rareden's Skybox hasn't shown up for me, even running 6.1. The progress bar shows it loading the textures, but they don't appear in game; I still see the default skybox.

Edited December 9, 2013 by Commander Zoom

Do you rename textures, appropriate to included ReadMe?

You must use GalaxyTex_Negative*.*, not SkyBox_Negative*.* from Universe Replacer.
Yes, I have. I downloaded the pre-renamed pack, and I'm looking at them right now in the folder. The first one is GalaxyTex_NegativeX.png , and five more in that style.

@Zoom: Have you downloaded TextureReplacer-1.5a.dll and forgot to delete it? I have no idea what else could be wrong.
shaw, 0.5a works fine, may be he is using 0.5 version, loaded before last one.
No, he said he uses "6.1".

Yes, but you gave us the link on TextureReplacer-0.5a.dll on previous page

I mean, may be he's put it near the TextureReplacer.dll, and it is loaded before.

Once I've done the same ))

I will check those out, I've been using the ones in Sido's texture pack which are the same but smaller jpg files.

Rareden's Skybox hasn't shown up for me, even running 6.1. The progress bar shows it loading the textures, but they don't appear in game; I still see the default skybox.

Rareden's Skybox works for me under 0.6.1.

Any who, new version let me install that one. Is 0.7 working fine?

Do you rename textures, appropriate to included ReadMe?

You must use GalaxyTex_Negative*.*, not SkyBox_Negative*.* from Universe Replacer.

I wonder why author didnt kept universe replacer syntax.

'Cause he chose different way ))

And I'm glad he did it.
Whats the difference between this and universe replacer?
